description:
Allows you move an object on a customizable grid with a customizable offset.

You can make simple puzzle games like Sokoban, Baba Is You, Patrick's Parabox, etc. or you could make simple topdown rpgs like Pokemon, Final Fantasy, etc.
name: GridBasedMovement
shortDescription: A simple behavior that allows grid based movement.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: A behavior that allows the player to move on a grid.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: GridBasedMovement

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object has just finished moving.
eventsFunctions.name: JustMoved

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object is moving.
eventsFunctions.name: IsMoving

eventsFunctions.description: Changes the size of the grid the object will move on.
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeGridSize
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set _PARAM0_'s grid to _PARAM2_ pixels wide and _PARAM3_ pixels tall

eventsFunctions.description: Set's the new offset of the grid the object will move on.
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeGridOffset

eventsFunctions.description: The angle the object is moving towards.(360 degrees).
eventsFunctions.name: MoveDirection

propertyDescriptors.label: How many pixels till end of movement.
propertyDescriptors.name: PixelsLeft

propertyDescriptors.label: A boolean to tell if the object is moving or not.
propertyDescriptors.name: Moving

propertyDescriptors.label: Object Move Speed(the larger the number, the faster you move)
propertyDescriptors.name: MoveSpd
